item.description: Most people ask where they can buy the stuffs from Chinese recipes.such as ( sauce, vege. spice, and so on) I guess it is a good time for us to go there to check it out. after DIM SUM August Moon Festival meetup, i will wait for all of you who interested in those food, at the same place entrance where we will have dim sun in that morning. the supermarket is next to the restaurant. i will be wait there about 10 mins. and all of you welcome to dim sun with us too. see you there.
item.how_to_find_us: I will wait with sign in front of entrance doors

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Chinese Supermarket Trip
